snippet: While Iraqis were enjoying the victory of the national soccer team with celebratory gunfire, gunmen took advantage of the sounds of the shooting and opened fire on three police checkpoints in Baghdad, killing seven officers, according to police...
abstract: Gunmen take advantage of the sounds of shooting, as Iraqis celebrate national soccer team victory with gunfire, and open fire on three police checkpoints in Baghdad, killing seven officers,
lead_paragraph: While Iraqis were enjoying the victory of the national soccer team with celebratory gunfire, gunmen took advantage of the sounds of the shooting and opened fire on three police checkpoints in Baghdad, killing seven officers, according to police sources.

headline.main: In Iraq, Celebration and Then Violence
